intent_atoms.description: Integrate ResearchLogMonitor audit into SwiftUI preview scenarios to surface schema drift, missing fixtures, and empty payloads during design-time validation.
ResearchLogPreviewProvider snapshots must trigger ResearchLogMonitor.audit for each preview composition.
Previews should include canonical VR-006 fixtures plus mismatch/missing variants to provide regression visibility.
Diagnostics from ResearchLogPreviewProvider must appear in ResearchLogAuditPreview and have verified accessibility identifiers via UI hosting tests.
ResearchLogMonitor.audit must always execute during SwiftUI preview rendering of VR-006 data.
Use ResearchLogPreviewProvider to supply snapshot previews with audit diagnostics integrated into the preview composition pipeline.

functional_units.name: ResearchLogMonitor.audit
functional_units.description: Validates research log data against schema, detecting drift, missing fixtures, and empty payloads during design-time validation

functional_units.name: ResearchLogPreviewProvider snapshots
functional_units.description: Generates SwiftUI preview compositions that include sample payloads and diagnostics for VR-006 research log data

functional_units.name: SwiftUI preview rendering of VR-006 fixtures
functional_units.description: Renders canonical, ready, missing, and schema mismatch fixtures in SwiftUI previews to exercise audit logic

functional_units.name: Diagnostics emission in ResearchLogAuditPreview
functional_units.description: Displays audit diagnostics alongside previewed payloads with accessibility identifiers for UI hosting tests

functional_units.name: Refresh process for preview fixtures on schema change
functional_units.description: Updates preview fixture bundles when schema fields change to keep designers unblocked
